sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
An order of the committee of the Lords and Commons at Guild-hall for the defence of the kingdom for the disarming and securing the persons of such as are disaffected to the Parliament :nd [sic] Commonwealth, with citie of Lodon [sic] and Westminster, and the suburbs within three miles of the citie. With a proclamation by the Lord Maior of London. England and Wales. Parliament.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed for I. Iackson, G. Tomlinson, and T. Homer, and are to be sold in the Old Baily, London : 1642. Novemb. 4.
A variant of the edition with line 3 of title beginning "with the cities of London" in place of "with citie of Lodon". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
An order of the committee of the Lords and Commons at Guild-hall for the defence of the kingdom for the disarming and securing the persons of such as are disaffected to the Parliament :nd [sic] Commonwealth, with citie of Lodon [sic] and Westminster, and the suburbs within three miles of the citie. With a proclamation by the Lord Maior of London. England and Wales. Parliament.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
printed for I. Iackson, G. Tomlinson, and T. Homer, and are to be sold in the Old Baily, London : 1642. Novemb. 4.
A variant of the edition with line 3 of title beginning "with the cities of London" in place of "with citie of Lodon". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
G. Tomlinson
I. Iackson
T. Homer
the Old Baily
>>>>>>> imprintparse
